name: Behemoth (Roberto M. Söderström)
description:
Behemoth is a 2D side-scrolling Shoot 'em Up.

The world is at war. You have succesfully infiltrated the enemy lines and stolen a massive prototype ship, you now have to fly it back to your home base!


Please note:

This game is uploaded for reference purposes. It was developed as a first year Game Design student project at Uppsala University - Campus Gotland with an aesthetic goal of 'Feel like you are operating heavy machinery' in mind. The downloadable version is the latest build of the game (March 2018).

Please keep in mind this was our very first game, and is thus far from perfect. Thank you for taking your time to take a look at it!


Credits (in alphabetical order):
  • Jad El Masri - Programming
  • Niklas Ericsson - Project Manager
  • Jesper Karbing - Art
  • Joakim Malmström - Level Design
  • Roberto Marcos Söderström - Art
  • Isac Thorsson - Programming
